document_data.name: The Rose and Dragon
document_data.mainbody: '''The Rose and Dragon''' was an upscale tavern of [[Suzail]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1479}}, prior to the [[Council of the Dragon]], the lords [[Broryn Windstag]], [[Kathkote Dawntard]] and [[Delasko Sornstern]] had offered much money at taverns frequented by servants of noblemen, including the Rose and Dragon, for any [[enchanted]] largish hand axe belonging to a noble under the assumption such were likely [[blueflame item]]s.
